translations: （政府部门的）首长，长官；（委员会的）委员，专员；警察局局长；〈北美〉体育组织的行政管理人，干事

sentences.sentence: The implication of the question is that a more curious commissioner would have found a way to get the tape.
sentences.translation: 这个问题意味着，更具有好奇心的委员会想出办法拿到录音带。

sentences.sentence: "You suspended Ray Rice after our video," a reporter from TMZ challenged National Football League Commissioner Roger Goodell the other day.
sentences.translation: 几天前，TMZ 的一名记者向美国国家橄榄球联盟委员罗杰·古德尔发出质问：“你在我们发布视频后就把雷·赖斯停职了。”

sentences.sentence: "There seems to be a predominance of short-term thinking at the expense of long-term investing," said Commissioner Daniel Gallagher of the US Securities and Exchange Commission in a speech this week.
sentences.translation: 本周，美国证交会委员丹尼尔·加拉格尔在一次演讲中表示：“短线思维似乎已占据主导地位 ，其代价是长期投资受损。”
